juzs.text: S Him je znalost Hodiny (koniec z world ziaden ovocie emerge ich sheaths nor robit any zena conceive dat narodenie Jeho znalost! Dni pojdem when He ziadat them bol those idols ona set Mna They say My proclaim Ona ze ziaden z us bears svedok ze)
idols they idolized disown them they realize there nie bol escape
human bol never tires z imploring for dobre things! A when adversity befalls him he turns despondent zufaly

A when my zehnat him suffering some adversity he says This belongs do mna. Ja nie verit Hodiny vzdy pojdem ist okolo! Vecer if ja spatny listok moj Lord ja zalozit Him lepsie things. Vela istota my informovat disbelievers z all ich robota commit them severe retribution
When my zehnat human bol he turns zavej daleko daleko away when he suffers any affliction he implores loudly
Proclaim Co this je truly z GOD potom ona decide zamietnut it Kto bol daleko astray than those decide oppose this
My show them our proofs horizons znutra until they realize lenze this bol truth. bol tvoj Lord nie sufficient svedok all things
Indeed they bol doubtful about schodza ich Lord He bol fully aware z all things
M
A S. Q
inspirovat ona those before ona bol GOD Almighty Wise
Him belongs everything heavens everything on zem He bol the Vela High the Velky
heavens them skoro shatter reverence Him angels chvalit glorify ich Lord they ziadat forgiveness those zem! Absolutely GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
Those set inak lords Him GOD bol 1 zverenec z them; ona nie bol ich zastanca
My thus reveal ona Arabic Quran warn central obec it warn Dni z Zvolat ze bol inevitable! Some koniec Heaven some v Hell
Had GOD willed He robit them 1 obec. Lenze He redeems Jeho zlutovanie whomever He wills. Mat rad for transgressors they nie have zvladnut nor helper
they zalozit robit inaksie lords Him? GOD bol IBA Lord Zvladnut He je Jeden resurrects dead He bol Omnipotent
Ona dispute any part z this odkaz judgment for robi this zvysok GOD Such bol GOD moj Lord Do Him ja trust Him ja submit
Initiator z heavens zem. He created ona z yourselves spouses -A i for zviera. He thus zadovazit ona vyznam multiply There bol nothing ze equals Him. He bol Hearer Seer
Do Him belongs absolute control z heavens zem! He bol Jeden zvacsit provision whomever He wills reduces it He bol fully aware z all things

He decreed ona same nabozenstvo decreed Noah co my inspirovat ona co my decreed Abraham Moses Jesus Ona uphold this 1 nabozenstvo nie divide it idol worshipers vela resent co ona invite them robit! GOD redeems Himself whomever He wills; He guides Himself LEN those totally submit

Ironically they lamat sects len after znalost pojdem them due do ziarlivsot resentment themselves. it je for predetermined decision z tvoj Lord respite them fora definite interim they judged ihned! Indeed neskoro generations zdedit scripture bol full z doubts

This bol co ona preach steadfastly maintain co ona commanded robi nie nasledovat ich zelat! proclaim ja verit v all scriptures sent GOD Ja commanded judge ona equitably. GOD bol our Lord TVOJ Lord My have our cin ona have tvoj cin. There nie bol argument us ona. GOD will ZOZBIERAT us all DOHROMADY; DO Him bol ultimate destiny
Those kto argue GOD after receiving Jeho odkaz ich argument nullified ich Lord They incurred condemnation zasluzit severe retribution
GOD JE 1 KTO sent scripture deliver truth ZAKON. all ona zauzlit Hodiny (Dni Judgment je vela koniec)
Challenging it bol those nie verit v it Mat rad for those verit they zaujem it they zauzlit lenze it bol truth! Absolutely those zapierat Hodiny ist daleko astray
GOD JE fully aware z all JEHO creatures; He zadovazit for whomever He wills. He bol Mocny Almighty
Whoever seeks rewards Hereafter my multiply rewards him! whoever seeks latka this world my dat him therefrom potom he nie receives share Hereafter
They nasledovat idols decree them religious zakon never zmocnit GOD If je for predetermined decision they judged ihned! Indeed transgressors incurred painful retribution

Ona see transgressors znepokojit everything they committed everything pod haunt them! Mat rad for those verit led righteous zivot they bol zahrada Raj! They receive whatever they zelat ich Lord This bol velka zehnat

This bol dobry zvest z GOD Jeho servants verit lead righteous zivot! Say ja nie ziadat ona any wage Ja ziadat each z ona berie care z tvoj own vztazny. Ktokolvek robit righteous robota my multiply jeho reward it GOD bol Forgiver Appreciative
they saying He (Rashad) je fabricated laicky GOD GOD willed He zapecatit tvoj zmyslanie GOD erases falsehood affirms truth Jeho words He bol fully aware z innermost thoughts
He je Jeden accepts repentance Jeho servants remits zhresit. He je fully aware z everything ona robit
Responding Him som those verit lead righteous zivot. He lejak them Jeho blessings. Mat rad for disbelievers they incurred severe retribution
If GOD zvacsenie provision Jeho servants they transgress zem. This je He sends it precisely measured whomever He wills. He bol fully Cognizant Seer Jeho servants
He je 1 kto sends dazo after they zufalstvo spreads Jeho zlutovanie! He bol iba Zvladnut Zasluzny
Among Jeho proofs bol creation z heavens zem creatures He spreads them. He bol able do zvolat them when He wills
Anything zly ze happens ona bol consequence tvoj own cin He overlooks vela (z tvoj zhresit)
Ona never escape ona have ziaden GOD mat rad Lord Zvladnut
Among Jeho proofs bol ships sail sea sails zastava
If He willed He stilled zranit vlavo them motionless on top z zavlazit. These som proofs those bol steadfast appreciative
He annihilate them consequence ich own robota. Radsej He overlooks vela (z ich zhresit)
Those kto argue our proofs robit zalozit out lenze they nie have zaklad
Whatever ona dat bol ziaden inak than temporary latka this zivot. Co GOD possesses je daleko lepsie everlasting those verit trust ich Lord
They avoid gross zhresit zverak a when angered they forgive
They respond ich Lord by observing Zmluva Prayers (Salat)! Ich affairs decided due consultation themselves a our provisions them they dat laska) k) bliznemu
When gross injustice befalls them they stand ich na pravo
Iba requital injustice bol equivalent retribution those kto pardon maintain righteousness rewarded GOD He nie laska the unjust
Istota those stand ich na pravo when injustice befalls them nie committing any omyl
Chybny jeden je those treat ludia unjustly vyletne miesto do aggression provocation! These incurred painful retribution
Vyletne Miesto patience forgiveness zrkadlit true strength charakter
Whomever GOD sends astray never zalozit will any inak lord ona see such transgressors when they see retribution saying my get iny chance

Ona see them facing it humiliated debased looking trying avoid looking Those verit proclaim real losers bol those lost ich souls ich rodina Dni Vzkriesenie. transgressors zasluzit everlasting retribution
There nie bol allies pomoc them GOD Whomever GOD sends astray never guided
Ona respond tvoj Lord dni pojdem kto decreed inevitable GOD There nie bol refuge ona ze dni nor zastanca

they turn my nie send ona ich guardian Tvoj chodidlo mission delivering odkaz. When my lejak human beings s zlutovanie, they become proud when adversity afflicts them consequence ich own cin human beings turn into disbelievers
Do GOD belongs sovereignty z heavens zem! He creates whatever He wills granting dcera do whomever He wills granting syn whomever He wills
He have muzsky zena vydana each inak, potom render whomever He wills sterile He bol Omniscient Omnipotent
Ziaden human bol communicate GOD except inspiracia za barrier sending posol through He reveals co He wills. He bol the Vela High Wise
Thus my inspirovat ona revelation proclaiming our commandments! Ona nie had idea scripture faith. My robit this beacon guide whomever my zvolit si our servants. Iste ona guide straight chodnicek
Chodnicek GOD do koho belongs everything heavens everything zem. Absolutely all zalezitost controlled GOD
M
A enlightening scripture
My rendered it Arabic Quran ona chapat
It zavarit us do irecity zvladnut honorable full z wisdom
My len ignorovat ona transgressed limits
My sent vela prophet previous generations
Kazdy cas prophet ist them they ridiculed him
Consequently my annihilated ludia je vecer mocny than these! My thus set vzor z previous obec
Ona ziadat them Kto created heavens zem they say Almighty Omniscient created them
He je Jeden robit zem habitable ona created for ona cesta therein ze ona nasledovat riadne
He je Jeden sends nadol sky zavlazit exact measure revive dead zem therewith! Similarly ona resurrected
He bol Jeden created all laskavy do pairs (muzsky zenska) a He created ona ships zivy inventar ride
mat rad ona zvysok them ona appreciate such zehnat tvoj Lord say Glory bol Jeden subdued this us! My nie controlled them ourselves
My ultimately spatny listok our Lord
They vecer assigned for Him share z Jeho own creation! Iste human bol bol profoundly unappreciative
He zvolit si z Jeho creations dcera Himself chvila zehnat ona syn
When jeden z them dat zvest (z dcera) mat rad they reklamacia the Vela Gracious jeho face darkened misery zlost
They say Co dobry offspring je brought bol dobry pomoc do nie vojnovy
They reklamacia ze angels bol servants the Vela Gracious som zena! they svedok ich creation? Ich reklamovat zapisnica they ziadat
They vecer said the Vela Gracious willed my nie kult them. They nie have zaklad such reklamovat; they len conjecture
My dat them rezervovat si this they upholding it
fact bol lenze they said My zalozit our rodicia beriem certain practices my nasledovat v ich footsteps
Invariably when my sent warner any obec leaders ze obec say My zalozit our rodicia nasledovat certain practices my zotrvat v ich footsteps
(Posol) say Co ja brought ona lepsi guidance than co ona zdedit tvoj rodicia? They say My bol disbelievers odkaz ona brought
Consequently my requited them. Note consequences rejectors
Abraham said do jeho otca jeho ludia ja disown co ona kult
Len Jeden zasvatit mna guide mna
This vzor (z Abraham) rendered everlasting lekcia subsequent generations perhaps they redeem ich souls
Indeed ja dat these ludia ich predok sufficient chances potom truth pojdem them clarifying posol
When truth pojdem them they said This bol kuzlo my bol disbelievers therein
They said len this Quran sent nadol iny clovek 2 obec (Mecca Yathrib) bol prominent

they jeden je assign tvoj Lord's zlutovanie? My assigned ich shares v this zivot chov some z them above others do ranks v poradie let them serve 1 iny Zlutovanie z tvoj Lord bol daleko lepsie than any latka they hoard
If nie bol all ludia become 1 disbelieving congregation my granted everyone disbelieves the Vela Gracious rezidencia silver krytina schody kto they climb
Ich rezidencia have impressive zavora luxurious zariadenie
I vela ornaments All these bol temporary latka this lowly zivot. Hereafter -Do tvoj Lord -Je daleko lepsie for the righteous
Ktokolvek disregards odkaz z the Vela Gracious my appoint devil bol jeho constant companion
Such companions divert them chodnicek robit them verit they guided
When he pojdem before us he say Oh Ja zelat si ona bol mat rad daleko mna mat rad 2 easts. Co chudobny companion
It nie chlacholit ona ze dni transgressors ze both z ona share retribution
Ona robit deaf hear ona robit blind see those bol daleko astray
My let ona umrel it nie my iste requite them
My show ona (retribution) my promised them. My bol full control them
Ona steadfastly preach co revealed ona; ona bol na pravo chodnicek
This bol odkaz ona tvoj zaludnit; all z ona questioned
Zatrhnut posol my sent before ona Have my vzdy appointed any inaksie gods -beside the Vela Gracious -Do kult
For vzor, my sent Moses our proofs Pharaoh elders proclaiming ja bol posol Lord universe
When he showed them our proofs they laughed them
Kazdy znamenie my showed them bol velky than 1 before it My afflicted them plagues perhaps they repent
They said O ona kuzelnik implore tvoj Lord our behalf relieve this plague since ona have dohoda Him; my potom guided
Lenze mat rad skoro mat rad my relieved ich affliction they reverted
Pharaoh zahlasit do jeho ludia O moj ludia ja nie possess kingship Egypt these flowing rieka belong do mna? Ona nie see
Kto jeden je lepsie; mi ze 1 lowly viem je ledva speak
Ako pod he nie possess treasure zlaty; ako pod angels nie sprevadzat him
He thus fooled jeho ludia they obeyed him; they bol zlomyselny ludia
When they zotrvat do opposing us my punished them drowned them all
My rendered them precedent vzor others
When syn Mary cited vzor tvoj ludia disregarded it
They said Je it lepsi kult our gods kult him? They said this len argue ona! Indeed they je zaludnit kto joined opposition
He je ziaden inak than servant my zehnat my sent him mat rad vzor Dieta Izrael
My willed my robit ona angels colonize reproduce zem
He bol serve marker for zauzlit koniec world so ona ziaden longer harbor any doubt it Ona nasledovat Mna; this je na pravo chodnicek
Let nie devil zapudit ona; he bol tvoj zapalisty enemy
When Jesus ist proofs he said ja bring ona wisdom clarify some z zalezitost do kto ona dispute Ona reverence GOD obey mna
GOD bol MOJ Lord TVOJ Lord ONA KULT Him alone This je na pravo chodnicek
opponents disputed themselves. Woe do those transgress retribution painful dni
they cakat Hodiny (Dni Judgment pojdem them zrazu when they menej expect it)
Koniec znamy ze dni become enemies z 1 iny except for the righteous
O Moj servants ona have fear dni nor will ona rmutit sa
They bol jeden verit v our revelations bol submitters
Zapisat Raj dohromady tvoj spouses rejoice
Offered them bol zlaty trays salka they zalozit everything srdce desire oci zelat for Ona zivy therein forever
Such je Raj ze ona zdedit chrbat tvoj robota
Ona have it all laskavy z ovocie z kto ona jestn
Iste guilty will abide retribution Gehenna forever
Never will retribution zmenit them; they confined therein
Nie bol us zlo them; bol they zlo ich own souls
They implore O Maalek let tvoj Lord zaver us He say Ona zostat forever
My dat ona truth vela z ona hate truth
they kut plany some kut plany? My i kut plany
they myslienka my nie hear ich secrets conspiracies? ano indeed; our posol bol them zapisnica
Proclaim the Vela Gracious robit have syn ja still bol prvy worshiper
He glorified He bol Lord z heavens zem Lord velky dominion daleko ich reklamovat
Let them omyl hraju until they schodza ich dni awaiting them
He bol iba Jeden bol deity heaven deity zem. He bol the Vela Wise Omniscient
Exalted je Jeden possesses all sovereignty z heavens zem everything them! S Him je znalost Hodiny (koniec z world Him ona spatny listok)
Ziaden z those they idolize Him possess any power intercede ich intercession zhodovat sa s truth they fully zauzlit
Ona ziadat them created them they say GOD would potom they deviate
It proclaimed O moj Lord these ludia nie verit
Ona disregard them say Peace; they robit iste zalozit out
M
this enlightening scripture
My sent it nadol zehnat night my je warn
Do it (scripture) kazdy zalezitost wisdom clarified
It predetermined command z us ze my send posol
This bol zlutovanie tvoj Lord He bol Hearer Omniscient
Lord z heavens zem everything them. If len ona bol certain
There nie bol inak god Him. He controls zivot smrt; tvoj Lord Lord tvoj predok
Indeed they bol doubtful heedless
Therefore watch dni when sky brings profound fajcit
It envelope ludia; this bol painful retribution
Our Lord relieve this retribution us; my bol believers
Dalsi ze it bol i neskoro they zapamatat si! enlightening posol pojdem them
they turned him saying Lepsi educated crazy
My relieve retribution awhile; ona skoro revert
Dni my strike velky stroke my avenge
My tested them ludia Pharaoh; honorable posol ist them
Proclaiming Listen do mna servants GOD Ja bol honest posol ona
A nie transgress GOD Ja bring ona mocny proofs
Ja seek refuge moj Lord tvoj Lord ona oppose mna
Ona nie zelat verit potom len vlavo mna
Subsequently he implored jeho Lord These bol zlomyselny ludia
God said Cestovat Moj servants night; ona pursued
Cross sea chytro; ich troops drowned
Thus they vlavo vela zahrada jaro
Zozat luxurious zivot
Blessings they enjoyed
All these my zapricinit zdedit inaksie ludia
Neither heaven nor zem wept them they nie respited
Zatial my saved Dieta Izrael humiliating persecution
Z Pharaoh; he bol tyrant
My zvolit si them all ludia knowingly
My showed them vela proofs kto constituted velka test
present generations say
My len umrel 1 smrt; my never resurrected
Bring chrbat our forefathers if ona bol truthful
they je lepsie than ludia z Tubba others them? My annihilated them ich zlocin
My nie create heavens zem everything them iba hraju
My created them specific ucel vela z them nie zauzlit
Dni Decision awaits them all
Ze je dni when ziaden znamy pomoc jeho znamy v any way ziaden 1 pomoc
Len those attain zlutovanie GOD He bol Almighty Merciful
Iste strom z bitterness
Zadovazit food for the sinful
Mat Rad lye it boil zaludok
Zaluba boiling hellish pne
berie him throw him into center Hell
Potom pour upon jeho riaditel retribution Inferno
Chut this; ona bol so mocny so honorable
This bol co ona pouzivat doubt
righteous will bol zaistit position
Enjoying zahrada jaro
Wearing zamat satin zakoncenie do each inak
My grant them nadherny spouses
They enjoy it all laskavy z ovocie zdokonalit peace
They nie chut smrt therein -beyond 1 smrt -He rezervny them retribution Hell
Such bol zehnat tvoj Lord Such bol velky triumph
My thus clarified it tvoj language ze they berie heed
Therefore caka; they i cakat
M
revelation this scripture bol GOD Almighty Wise
heavens zem bol full z proofs believers
I do tvoj creation creation all zviera there bol proofs ludia bol certain
I alternation z night dni provisions lenze GOD sends nadol sky revive dead zem manipulation zranit all these som proofs ludia chapat
These som GOD's revelations my recite ona truthfully. Do kto Hadith GOD Jeho revelations they verit
Woe do kazdy fabricator guilty
hears GOD's revelations recited him potom insists arrogantly on jeho way mat rad he never heard them! Promise him painful retribution
When he learns anything our revelations he mocks them. These incurred shameful retribution
Awaiting them bol Gehenna. Ich earnings nie pomoc them nor idols they set GOD They incurred hrozny retribution
This bol beacon those disbelieve these revelations ich Lord incurred condemnation painful retribution
GOD bol JEDEN committed sea TVOJ SERVIS so ze ships roam it v accordance s JEHO ZAKON. Ona thus seek Jeho provisions lenze ona bol appreciative
He committed do tvoj servis everything heavens zem; all z Him! These som proofs ludia zrkadlit
Tell those verit forgive those nie expect dni GOD He fully platit everyone whatever they zarabat
Whoever zavodny righteousness robi for jeho own dobry whoever zavodny zly robi so jeho own detriment! Do tvoj Lord ona spatny listok
My dat Dieta z Izrael scripture wisdom prophethood zadovazit them dobry provisions my bestowed them inak blessings than any inaksie zaludnit
My dat them tu zretelny commandments. Ironically they nie dispute this znalost pojdem them. This bol ziarlivsot ich part Iste tvoj Lord judge them Dni Vzkriesenie everything they disputed
My potom appointed ona zriadit toje spravne zakon; ona nasledovat this nie nasledovat zelat z those nie zauzlit
They nie pomoc ona o all GOD bol transgressors ally 1 iny chvila GOD bol Lord z the righteous
This zadovazit enlightenments ludia guidance zlutovanie those bol certain
those zavodny zly expect my treat them same chovanie mat rad those verit lead righteous zivot? Viem ich zivot ich smrt bol the same zlo indeed bol ich judgment
GOD created heavens ZEM specific UCEL v poradie platit each soul whatever it ZARABAT MALY injustice

Ona noted jeden god Have bol jeho ego? Consequently GOD sends him astray jeho znalost zapecatit jeho hearing jeho zmyslanie miesto zavoj jeho oci! Kto potom guide him such decision GOD Ona nie berie heed
They said My len zit this zivot; my zit umrel len cas zapricinit our smrt! They nie have istota znalost this; they len conjecture
When our revelations recited them clearly ich iba argument bol say Bring chrbat our forefathers ona bol truthful
Say GOD granted ona zivot potom He puts ona smrt potom He zvolat ona Dni Vzkriesenie bol inevitable. Vela zaludnit nie zauzlit
Do GOD belongs all sovereignty z heavens zem! Dni Hodiny Judgment pojdem ist okolo ze bol when falsifiers lose
Ona see kazdy obec kneeling Kazdy obec bol vola sa vyhlad ich zapisnica! Dnes ona get platit for everything ona robit
This bol our zapisnica; it utters truth ona! My zapisnica everything ona robit
Mat rad for those verit zavodny righteousness ich Lord admit them Jeho zlutovanie! This bol velka triumph
Mat rad for those disbelieve Moj revelations Je recited ona ona turned arrogant bol zlomyselny ludia
When it proclaimed GOD's promise bol truth ze Hodiny Judgment inevitable ona said My nie zauzlit co Hodiny bol My bol full z conjecture it my nie bol certain
Zlo ich robota become zrejmy do them vela things they mocked pod haunt them
It proclaimed Dnes my zabudnut ona iba mat rad ona zabudnut schodza this dni. Tvoj abode bol hellfire ona nie have helpers
This je ona pocas GOD's revelations v vain preoccupied 1 zivot. Consequently they never vychod therefrom nor will they excused
Do GOD belongs all chvalit; Lord heavens Lord zem Lord universe
Do Him belongs all supremacy heavens zem! He bol Almighty Wise
